== BIOS settings ==

For all machines, there is a necessary change of BIOS setting for Ubuntu certification. And this setting is preloaded on machines shipped with preloaded Ubuntu.
* Disable "System configuration/Thunerbolt Auto Switch/Auto Switch"
* Enable "System configuration/Thunerbolt Auto Switch/Native Enumeration"
<nowiki>[[File:7730_I_N_UMA_bios_TB_setting.png]]</nowiki>

For machines that has AMD dGPU, there is a necessary change of BIOS setting for Ubuntu certification. And this setting is preloaded on machines shipped with preloaded Ubuntu.

* Disable "Settings/Video/Switchable Graphics/Enable Switchable Graphics"
<nowiki>[[File:7730_I_A_bios_setting.png]]</nowiki>

For machines without AMD dGPU, there is a necessary change of BIOS setting for Ubuntu certification. And this setting is preloaded on machines shipped with preloaded Ubuntu.
* Enable "Settings/Video/Switchable Graphics/Enable Switchable Graphics"
* Disable "Settings/Video/Switchable Graphics/Discrete Graphics Controller Direct Output Mode"
<nowiki>[[File:7730_I_N_UMA_bios_setting1.png]]</nowiki>

== Restricted configuration ==

 - Machines that has thunderbolt alpine ridge are not certified.

== Note ==

 - The HDMI port is wired to dGPU so that HDMI will not work while dGPU is off.
